description.plain:
Sophie Dyson, or known as Sody, is a 19 year old British singer. Her debut single, “Sorry”, gave rise to an EP released on June 17, 2016, called “Youth”. She’s gotten her start with a YouTube channel where she posted her music, music videos, and song covers.

She signed a record label deal with Relentless Records at 17, and has been releasing singles, like “Maybe It Was Me” and “The Bully” ever since. Her second EP, I’m Sorry, I’m Not Sorry was released on December 13, 2019.
